1047190.name: Lantern of Worlds - Storybook
1047190.description:
'Lantern of Worlds - Storybook' is a collection of adventure games and stories set in the Lantern of Worlds universe.

Story

The kingdom of Idunia is in turmoil. Dark forces gather in secluded forests, in mountain deeps, in shadowy swamps, and spin the treads of a great web of deceit and betrayal.

King Valdemar has called upon the heroes of the land to go forth and seek out the evil that grows within, and meet it with sword and shield, with spell and staff, with great determination.

And you are one such hero. But are you destined to become to greatest hero of the land? To be immortalized in song and story, in the memories of a thousand generations?

Or will you fall into darkness, yield before the enemy, and rise a shadowy reflection of yourself, a blight upon the land?

Only time will tell.

Features


* Several games and stories of heroism and adventure in a single package.
* Explore tropical islands, dark forests, shadowy mountains, and much more.
* Fight and defeat evil foes and menacing monsters.
* Save the kingdom of Idunia, or be the herald of it's downfall.





The game is entirely free, but if you like what you see, and would like to support the building and growing of the lands of Idunia, please take a look at our other game, BeetleQuest!
Any proceeds will go a long way to raising castles, digging dungeons, and smithing weapons and armor for you, the hero!
1047190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
